overview:
Kelly Wanser is Founder, Chairman and CEO of eCert. Wanser is a seasoned executive, strategist and technologist, with more than12 years of experience in Internet, email and communications, including numerous patents in electronic messaging and security.

Identifying a critical area of security exposure for enterprises, in 2006, Wanser established the Trusted Email Consortium for Financial Services, working with a number of the largest U.S. financial institutions and several major Internet Service Providers to explore methods to combat phishing and improve trust in email and Internet-based communications. Based on the findings of this collaboration, Wanser established a technical roadmap for improvements to SMTP email and related technologies and, in early 2008, founded eCert as a Trust Authority for email.
